Text:
MKV or MP4?

What are the bitrates?

SOURCE V/A.......: DAA's x264 (V)                                                                             VIDEO............: ~3333 kbps, XVid 
AUDIO............: ~640 kbps, 6 chnls, AC3 RESOLUTiON.......: 1280 x 536
FRAMERATE........: 23.976 FPS

Great rip, a touch blocky on the black/night scenes, but that's being picky. I only watch Hi-res rips and this is top drawer.

Video 9.5/10
Audio 9.5/10

Works perfect on PS3, no Cinavia.
